g++   -g -Wall -Wextra -Werror -Wconversion -Wno-unused-parameter -Wold-style-cast -Woverloaded-virtual -Wpointer-arith -Wno-error=shadow -Wwrite-strings -march=native -std=c++11   CMakeFiles/median_sorter.dir/sorter.cc.o  -o ../../bin/median_sorter  -L/home/kong/project/build/release-install-cpp11/lib -rdynamic libmedian_proto.a ../../muduo/protorpc2/libmuduo_protorpc2.a -lmuduo_protorpc_wire -lmuduo_protobuf_codec -lmuduo_net -lmuduo_base -lprotobuf -lpthread -lrt -lz -Wl,-rpath,/home/kong/project/build/release-install-cpp11/lib
